mapper.insert:
select seq_trip_list_serial.nextval from dual
insert into trip_list(trip_list_serial, member_id, trip_name, days_count, start_date, end_date, trip_auth, trip_date) values(#{trip_list_serial}, #{member_id}, #{trip_name}, ${days_count}, #{start_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{end_date,jdbcType=DATE}, ${trip_auth}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select trip_list_serial, member_id, trip_name, days_count, to_char(start_date,'rrrr/mm/dd') start_date, to_char(end_date,'rrrr/mm/dd') end_date, trip_auth, trip_date from trip_list order by trip_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into like_list(like_serial, member_id, trip_list, place_serial, partner_serial) value(seq_like_list.val, #{member_id}, ${trip_list}, ${place_serial}, ${partner_serial} )
